name: Death and Dust
description:
Compete against your friends in this FPS Multiplayer Game
8 players per map
Chat system
Single Player with 2 missions

6 Maps :
-Desert
-Destroyed City
-Bunker
-Hangar
-Apocalypse
-Abandoned City

7 Weapons:
-M4
-Pump
-AK47
-Sniper
-MP5
-Knife
-Pistol

Many weapons is coming
